topics.body:
Speaking of fictional cartoons I just thought of something; if real life was like in fictional television I would be the most boring super villain of all time.

"Nature-man" crashes through the roof and does a action pose, "I'm here to stop your evil reign of terror!"
"Evil reign of what now?"
"I'm here to stop your atrocities against nature?"
"Come again?"
"You're creating mutant animals and I'm here to stop your cruelty to nature!"
"Oh that!  I'm just inserting genes into species so that they're more resilient and inserted the gene responsible for human evolution while increasing the likelihood of mutations so as to speed up evolution"
"Your time is nigh!  The rightful order of nature shall be restored! I'm taking you in!"
"So you're a criminal vigilante?"
"No more of this nonsense!  You're criminal mastermind spree ends here"
"I have a permit"
"Stop trying to stall for time!  HEYAH!-"
*hits them with a tazer then calls the police*
